0.text: Innate: Whenever Singed moves near a  champion, he gains  20% bonus movement speed for 2 seconds, which refreshes on subsequent passes and stacks up to 25 times.

1.text: This effect cannot occur on the same target more than once every few seconds.

0.text: Toggle: Singed continually creates a toxic cloud in his wake that lingers for 3.25 seconds. The cloud inflicts  poison to enemies within, and resets the duration every 0.5 seconds while they remain.

1.text: poison: The target takes magic damage every 0.25 seconds over 2 seconds. Subsequent inflictions refresh the duration.

0.text: Active: Singed spills a potent adhesive that lands at the target location over 0.264 seconds to 0.528 seconds, creating a field for 3 seconds that  grounds enemies within and  slows them.
Active: Singed  flings the target enemy 550 units over himself, dealing magic damage, capped against  minions and  monsters.

1.text: If the target lands on  Mega Adhesive, they are  rooted for a duration.

0.text: Active: Singed empowers himself for 25 seconds with  bonus ability power,  bonus armor,  bonus magic resistance,  bonus movement speed,  bonus health regeneration, and  bonus mana regeneration.

1.text: During this time,  Poison Trail additionally applies 25%  Grievous Wounds for 1 second, and refreshes every 0.25 seconds while the  poison persists.
